message.content:
cs.DB, cs.AI, cs.LO, cs.DS, cs.PL. 

The paper discusses the extension of Datalog-like languages to solve classical computational problems using greedy algorithms. This involves the use of preference annotations and alternative stable-models, which are techniques commonly used in the areas of database systems (cs.DB) and artificial intelligence (cs.AI). The paper also discusses the computational complexity of the proposed approach, which is a topic of interest in the areas of logic and optimization (cs.LO), data structures and algorithms (cs.DS), and programming languages (cs.PL).
